name: N and J Home Care INC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: N and J Home Care INC is a Home Health provider based in Rego Park, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $66.9M in Medicaid payments across 415K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $66.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
